dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] DMCA Notice: afghanano1.atspace.com (70.86.253.84)]
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: abuseadm@theplanet.com [mailto:abuseadm@theplanet.com] On Behalf Of
The Planet Policy Enforcement
Sent: Thursday, March 16, 2006 5:16 PM
To: mat.sumpter@inetinteractive.org; copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] DMCA Notice: afghanano1.atspace.com (70.86.253.84)]

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.


-------- Original Message --------
Subject:         [ABUSE] DMCA Notice: afghanano1.atspace.com (70.86.253.84)
Date:         Thu, 16 Mar 2006 17:40:15 -0500
From:         Mat Sumpter <mat.sumpter@inetinteractive.org>
To:         <abuse@theplanet.com>
CC:         troy.augustine@inetinteractive.com



To Whom It May Concern:



I am notifying you on behalf of iNET Interactive, owner of HotScripts.com,
that ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. is hosting a design rip of our
site HotScripts.com. The offending material can be viewed at
http://afghanano1.atspace.com/



Attached is our formal DMCA notice.





Mathew Sumpter, IT Manager

iNET Interactive

P: 877-INETINT ext. 4146

F: 937-531-6603




--
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html
